 No, and no, this is a younger child, recently missing, I have not called y=
et, I want to see if anyone can hear what I am hearing yet before I let the=
m know.=C2=A0 I got names, and the little guy, I think said "hi" to me.=C2=
=A0 At this point no one else is able to hear my files, so I won't do a thi=
ng until i get validation from the so-called living first. sf

 



-----Or=
iginal Message-----
From: rasterer <rasterer@...>
To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 2010 9:34 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: depre=
ssing,

          =C2=A0                                  Do you mean the m=
issing 7-year-old Oregon boy named Kyron Horman?
 
 Have you told the polic=
e that Morgan has him? Have you told them what you know?  
 
 --- In EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
 >
 > These are files concern=
ing a recent missing child, I will not say whom, but 
 >  it is on file,=
 sad to hear. sf
 >
 
 
      
                 
   
       
  


----------MB_8CCFBB0859DF7EC_D88_F502_webmail-m003.sysops.aol.com

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> No, and=
 no, this is a younger child, recently missing, I have not called yet, I wa=
nt to see if anyone can hear what I am hearing yet before I let them know.&=
nbsp; I got names, and the little guy, I think said "hi" to me.  At th=
is point no one else is able to hear my files, so I won't do a thing until =
i get validation from the so-called living first. sf<br>
</div>

<div> <br>=

</div>

<div><br>
</div>
